name: Jawa Ion Gun
Lore: 'Cobbled-together weapon built from salvaged power cells, droid restraining bolts and an ion accelerator. Fires a stream of ion energy that stuns droids and irritates others.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on your Jawa, 3 on your warrior. May target a character using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Targeted droid stolen if destiny +1 > forfeit. Targeted non-droid character excluded from battle if destiny = defense value.',
